EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in August 2014
EmailTemplate.name: 6-8 October Uniform Shop Closed Rosinka
EmailTemplate.subject: 6-8 October Uniform Shop Closed Rosinka
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,
We would like to inform you that the uniform shop will be closed for 3 days, Monday through Wednesday, the 6th to 8th of October.
It will open again on Thursday the 9th operating with normal hours, from 8:30am - 4:30pm.
We apologise for the short notice. Thank you.
Kind Regards,
Rosinka Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
